{{Description|"Hey, overdosing on medicine is no different from poison, you know, it's real dangerous! But patients need care and concern, and nobody can overdose on that!"}}
'''Super Saturated Syringing''' is [[Sigewinne]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This skill deals DMG every 0.4s to opponents within its AoE.
* Skill DMG of this Talent features a Poise Sequence on its ICD. Repeated hits dealt to the same enemy within '''1.9s''' of the first hit (i.e. hits that do not apply Hydro) will only deal '''50''' Poise DMG instead of 100.
* During the duration of this skill, Sigewinne levitates and can move over the surface of [[water]] and [[Liquid Phlogiston]].

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|"Can the Loveliest of Spirits Keep Decay at Bay?"}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|"Can the Most Joyful of Spirits Alleviate Agony?"}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|"Can the Most Radiant of Spirits Pray For Me?"}}
